title: Who Paintin' dis Wandjina?
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Aboriginal Australians - Legends
abstract: Set in Perth and surrounds, this short film examines the impact of hundreds of spray-painted images of Wandjinas.
description: Maintaining anonymity, a non-Indigenous graffiti artist speaks about the hundreds of Wandjina stencils and graffiti around the city of Perth, Western Australia. Traditional owners of the sacred Wandjina – an ancient creator spirit – respond and explain the inappropriateness of this being graffitied without 'proper' knowledge.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002763; Black Screen; Active; 2014
